name: Prescripts's Blessing
uniques: Comment [Strength is Proportional to the amount of Faith Stockpiled, with Progressing Eras increasing the max Strength capacity bonus]
[+20]% Strength <when number of [Faith] is more than [100]>
[+20]% Strength <when number of [Faith] is more than [200]>
[+20]% Strength <when number of [Faith] is more than [300]> <starting from the [Renaissance era]>
